name: Environaut\Export\Formatter\IReportFormatter
short_desc: Interface that report formatters must implement.

format.name: format
format.short_desc: This method takes the given report and then does something with it.
format.long_desc:
This may include
writing the settings and messages to different files or send them somewhere.

It may return strings that will be output to the console afterwards. The return
messages may be formatted with tags understood by the Symfony Console Component.

setParameters.name: setParameters
setParameters.short_desc: Sets the given runtime parameters on the formatter.
